article_title: ‘Trust me’ isn’t going to turn the Latino vote for Ted Cruz or the rest of the GOP
article_text: Sen. Ted Cruz believes, with some justification, that Latinos are fundamentally conservative. Like many immigrant groups, they tend to honor faith, tradition and family. But that doesn’t mean that candidates seeking Latino votes for the GOP presidential nomination won’t have to answer the tough questions about where they stand on significant issues. Like immigration.

article_summary:
Sen. Ted Cruz believes, with some justification, that Latinos are fundamentally conservative.
But that doesn’t mean that candidates seeking Latino votes for the GOP presidential nomination won’t have to answer the tough questions about where they stand on significant issues.
Like many immigrant groups, they tend to honor faith, tradition and family.
Like immigration.
